sentences.sContent: As a mediator, America could work to prevent what the reportcalls violence created from insecurity in Southeast Asia and the Middle East.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a mediator, America could work to prevent what the reportcalls violence created from insecurity in Southeast Asia and the Middle East.
sentences.sCn: 作为一个调停者，美国可以做一些工作，去防止该份报告认为的在东南亚和中东地区的不稳定引发的暴力行为。

sentences.sContent: All proposals were rejected by the mediator.
sentences.sContent_eng: All proposals were rejected by the mediator.
sentences.sCn: 所有的建议都被仲裁人驳回。

remMethod.val: 来自mediate (v. 调停， 仲裁)

trans.tranOther: a person or organization that tries to end a quarrel between two people, groups, countries etc by discussion
